column1: The '''Appledore Family''' were a family of [[Big Folk]] who lived in [[Bree]]. Only one member of the family is known
column3: who was killed in fighting at [[Bree]] during the [[War of the Ring]].<ref>{{RK|VI7}}</ref>

column1: Appledore is an old word for "[[apples|apple-tree]]" and survives in English place-names. It represents a dialectal or archaic word of the same meaning in [[Westron]].<ref>[[J.R.R. Tolkien]]
column3: "Guide to the Names in ''The Lord of the Rings''"
column4: published in ''[[A Tolkien Compass]]'' (edited by [[Jared Lobdell]])
